author: Ed Baines
method: Cut four slices from the bread and spread with butter.  Spread mayonnaise across two of the slices and top with the chicken breast, spring onion, avocado and salad.  Top the chicken and salad with the other slices of bread and serve.
ingredients: 1 bloomer ,  knob of spreadable butter,  mayonnaise,  1 smoked chicken breast, chopped,  1 bunch spring onion, finely chopped ,  1 ripe avocado ,  handful crisp salad leaves
